Catma

class Catma(gitlab_access_token: str)

Bases: object

Class which represents all Projects of 1 CATMA User.

Parameters

gitlab_access_token (str) – Token for gitlab access. Use the CATMA UI (https://app.catma.de/catma/) or the CATMA Gitlab (https://git.catma.de/users/sign_in) to get your personal access token.

gitlab_access_token

The access token of the CATMA account.

project_name_list: List[str]

List of all projects within a CATMA account.

project_uuid_dict: Dict[str, str]

A dictionary with project names as keys an projects UUIDs as values.

project_dict: dict

A dictionary with project names as keys and instances of the CatmaProject class as values. The dict is empty as long as no projects have been loaded.

load_project_from_gitlab(project_name: str, backup_directory: str = './') → None

Load a CATMA Project from GitLab.

Parameters

  • project_name (str) – The CATMA Project name.

  • backup_directory (str) – Where to store the project.

load_all_projects_from_gitlab() → None

Loads all CATMA projects in your account after creating a local Git clone of these projects.

load_local_project(project_directory: str, project_name: str, included_acs: Optional[list] = None, excluded_acs: Optional[list] = None) → None

Loads a local CATMA Project and stores it in the project_dict.

Parameters

  • project_directory (str) – Directory where the CATMA Project is located.

  • project_name (str) – The CATMA Project name.

  • included_acs (list, optional) – Annotation Collections to load. If set to None and excluded_acs is None too all annotation collections get loaded. Defaults to None.

  • excluded_acs (list, optional) – Annotation Collections not to load. Defaults to None.

git_clone_command(project_name: str) → str

Creates Git clone command for the given CATMA project.

Parameters

project_name (str) – The project’s name.

Returns

Git clone command.

Return type

str
